content: कल्मष {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Sinful, wicked. {@--2@} Foul, dirty. --षः, --षं {@--1@} Stain, dirt, dregs. {@--2@} The hand below the wrist. {@--3@} Sin; स हि गगनविहारी कल्मषध्वंसकारी <ls>H. 1. 21</ls>; <ls>Bg. 4. 30</ls>; <ls n="Bg.">5. 16</ls>; <ls>Ms. 4. 260</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">12. 18</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 12.">22.</ls> --षः Hell.
